summary: Resolved conflicts in src/utils/filterDrinks.ts and docs/components.md. For filterDrinks.ts, kept the 3-parameter function signature (drinks, category, query) used by the existing tests and useDrinks.ts hook, while also incorporating the CATEGORIES and CATEGORY_LABELS constants added by origin/main (required by FilterBar.tsx). For docs/components.md, preserved both the filterDrinks utility documentation from HEAD and the FilterBar/SearchBox/ComparisonPanel/NutritionRow/NutritionBar component documentation from origin/main.
strategyUsed: preserved both changes: kept HEAD function signature for filterDrinks (compatible with existing tests and useDrinks hook), added origin/main constants (CATEGORIES, CATEGORY_LABELS) needed by FilterBar; merged both documentation sections in docs/components.md
